medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two days prior, described as 'gassy, sharp pains' in lower quadrants that self-resolved a few weeks ago. Current symptoms recur with subjective fevers and chills, and a temperature of 100.6. Denies nausea, vomiting, or anorexia, but notes thirst with slight hunger. Stools have been loose, non-bloody, and without melena.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulosis; past surgical history includes right rectus sheath muscle flap transfer to left foot, left knee cartilage repair, left tib-fib ORIF, left ankle fusion, wisdom teeth extraction.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of IBD, GI or hepatobiliary disease, or malignancy.
